entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having heard about Professor Trelawney's Inner Eye before.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is the Divination teacher at Hogwarts. She has an 'Inner Eye' that allows her to see visions of the future.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He prefers fewer visits from Professor Trelawney.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is celebrating something. Harry suspects that Malfoy threw Professor Trelawney out of the Room.

relationships.description: Harry suspects that someone (Malfoy) threw Professor Trelawney out of the Room.
Dumbledore prefers fewer visits from Professor Trelawney.
